PluginData.Author: Adriano
PluginData.Tooltip: Adds an App to LCD screens for monitoring Electric production and consumption.
PluginData.Description:
This mod adds an App to LCD screens for monitoring Electric production and consumption, also battery storage and detailed info per block. It saves a history of last 30 minutes of data and presents the info as a chart, with configurable interval.
Note: To prevent the window popup when you click you can use you middle click or have a tool like a welder equipped.
